title: Sundaram Home Finance hopeful of continuing growth momentum
description: Sundaram Home Finance plans to continue its growth momentum in the current financial year by expanding into smaller towns and exploring opportunities in Tier 4 towns in South India. The company, a subsidiary of Sundaram Finance Ltd, is optimistic about the real estate sector's outlook and expects growth momentum to continue. The company has opened 30 exclusive SBL branches in Tamil Nadu, with disbursements of over Rs 125 crore.
